extends BasePersistOperation

      • getFileListString

        public java.lang.String getFileListString()
        Convert the list of file names into a single String with \n at the end of each name. Useful for display purposes: /tmp/file1.txt /tmp/file2.txt /tmp/file3.txt becomes: /tmp/file1.txt\n/tmp/file2.txt\n/tmp/file3.txt
        Returns:
        String of file names
